text:
Priyanka Chopra turns producer

Priyanka Chopra’s first Marathi film as a producer has gone on the floors. The actor has stepped into the space with her Purple Pebble Pictures production house and took to Twitter to inform that she is now geared up for a Marathi film.

The 33-year-old took to Instagram and announced the news along with an image wherein the script and the clapboard of the film are kept in front of a photo of Lord Ganesha. Priyanka, who will have a guest appearance in the movie, wrote: "Congratulations @purplepebblepictures for starting # Ventilator.. Our 1st Marathi film!good luck to #rajeshmapuskar and the team! Ganpati Bappa Morya." The movie is titled Ventilator .

— IANS
title: Priyanka Chopra s first Marathi production goes on floors
